thread.title: Rick Paulson, San Diego, CA
thread.title_full: RushMyPassport.com reviewed by Rick Paulson, San Diego, CA

author: Rick Paulson, San Diego, CA
title: Rick Paulson, San Diego, CA
text:
I definitely highly recommend the RushMyPassport Service to any needing a passport or renewal in a hurry. After booking a trip to Puerto Vallarta, Mexico in August, 2016, I suddenly realized in January 2017 that my passport had expired in April, 2016, not 2017!
I contacted the RushMyPassport people and they got my renewal to me one day before my departure!
Although I had sent it on, there was a correction I made and initialed but the US government wouldn't accept that, so I had to resign it and resend it! But thanks to the diligence and concern of their employee, Quincy Vasquez, I was able to enjoy my trip to Mexico. He is a credit to your company and demonstrated compassion and capability in solving r my problem.
